```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
earthquake <- read.csv("flex/earthquakedata.csv")
```
### Data

```{r}
earthquake %>%
  filter(yr==1995) %>%
  datatable()
```


***

Dataset de los terremotos que ocurrieron en el año **1995** en todo el mundo.


### Terremotos mayores

```{r}
earthquake %>%
  filter(yr==1995, mag>6) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng= ~lon,
             lat = ~lat,
             label = ~mag)
```
